title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti with bacon and remove from heat.
Stir in egg mixture and season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a creamy tomato-based sauce.
instructions: Add cream and chicken to the sauce.
